original: Ajjhattikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ajjhattikam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Bāhiraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: bāhiram kusalam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Ajjhattikaṁ kusalañca bāhiraṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo
analyzed: ajjhattikam kusalañca bāhiram kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Ajjhattikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ajjhattikam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Bāhiraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: bāhiram akusalam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Ajjhattikaṁ akusalañca bāhiraṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo
analyzed: ajjhattikam akusalañca bāhiram akusalañca dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ na akusalaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
